A complete classic like the original. The only thing to make a special note of is that this game is extremely dark. It's clear the intention here was to give it a gloomy feel as you crawl around in the bowels of an automated industrial complex, but some of the gameplay ends up requiring you to squint at dark gray pixels on a black background for several straight rooms. Consider adding +mat_fullbright 1 to your game load options to make it a little easier to see.
this game would be a good game to start speed running and overall its realy enjoyable
Amazing game all around. Difficult enough to challenge but not to the point of giving up. Love the characters and how each one interacts with their situations and environment. Excellent.

While the CO-OP was fun, the visuals were great, and the new mechanics were enjoyable, I still prefer Portal 1 to this game. Now don't get me wrong, this was a good game, but Portal 1 had an atmosphere that felt much lonelier than Portal 2. You were stuck in a facility you knew nothing about, and it wasn't till the end that you understood what was going on. That atmosphere was something that just felt great and is what made the game shine for me (aside from the actual gameplay itself). I also thought the humor was a bit annoying at times. I got some laughs here and there but for a Portal game it just feels so out of place at times. That being said I still enjoyed this game quite a bit and will keep coming back to it and it's predecessor.

TL;DR: Good game but Portal 1 was better

Perfeito para matar o seu amigo no modo coop  :).

Лучше сами посмотрите. Вкратце скажу, что Валвы любят выцеплять талантливых и неизвестных разработчиков с инновационными идеями и внедрять их в свою компанию. Студенты, придумавшие Портал одна из их лучших находок. Теперь они часть Valve. А теперь по пунктам от игрока казуального и старого замечания по игре.1) Сюжет - потрясающий. Поверьте я такими словами просто так не раскидываюсь. Причем как всегда у Valve сюжет интегрирован в геймплей. Как это? Поиграйте узнаете.2) Графика - отличная. Никаких тормозов, лагов на среднем компьютере замечено не было.3) Геймплей - тоже потрясающий. С одним "но". Игра реально сложная и займет не один час реального времени. Я чтоб мозги не взорвались проходил по одному уровню в неделю, но раз пять все равно лез и искал видео прохождения. Слава богу людей умнее меня море в Интернете.4) Звук - ОМГ! Музыка - супер, финальная песенка - супер, озвучка даже русская просто шикарнейшая. Гладос и друг - робот просто живые.5) Мультиплеер-сильно зависит от слаженной работы двух игроков все так и должно быть в любом кооп  С ачивками, дополнительным сюжетом и т. д. То есть брать лицензию - это просто необходимо.

Buen juegos de puzle con interesante trama
portal is one of those games that is a one in a million combination of puzzle and first person platformer while at the same time having an amazing story and breaking the laws of physics! I love it!

Portal 2, al igual que las segundas entregas de Valve, mejora muchísimo los aspectos jugables del original. Es entretenido, y el modo cooperativo es una gran adición a la saga, muy divertido, tanto solo, en el modo historia, como con un amigo en el modo cooperativo.

Tiene una buena historia, con giros bien trabajados y buenos personajes, los puzzles están muy bien pensados, se nota el tiempo y dedicación que le pone Valve a sus juegos. En algunas ocasiones se puede volver un poco frustrante, pero no arruina la grandiosa experiencia que da este juego. En el aspecto gráfico se mantiene  muy bien hasta día de hoy, lo cual es increíble, siendo que el juego tiene casi 10 años.

Recomendadísimo, si quieres jugar con un amigo te la vas a pasar muy bien, pero si prefieres jugar solo también es entretenido. Te puede dar muchas horas de juego.

One of a kind game, the portal and gel concept in Portal 2 made it so much more interesting. The plot twists and the antagonists of the game made the game engaging and fun to follow along. The concept of a open underground laboratory makes you feel like you are in the game itself.  For $10, the amount of content provided is amazing. Definitely worth playing.

Absolute masterpiece of a game. Lots of hidden easter eggs and depth to the game in the back-story to Aperture Science if you pay enough attention. Also very immersive and well put-together.

At the current price, not buying this game would simply be a mistake.
The two main characters, GladOS and Whitley, have got to be the best characters in the history of gaming. But Whitley comes first. I didn't think it was possible to have such a deep (and fun) character in a game.
